events.name: Spring
events.desc: Begins on the spring equinox, divided into early-, mid-, and late-, which are further divided into five weeks of six days

events.name: The Story Begins
events.desc: Danny and Alric lose the fight with [link:side_characters,bruno_riverfrost] and his cronies.
events.time: A year before the journey begins.

events.name: Nameday
events.desc: Danny and Alric set off on an adventure

events.name: [link:locations,respite]
events.desc: Alric and Danny unknowningly aid and then kill a heritic

events.name: Meeting [link:side_characters,ash]
events.desc: Danny begins hearing a something almost like a lute in the distance as they travel and notices small amounts of food are going missing. After placing ash around some food that is left out they discover bird tracks in it the next morning. Danny manages to coax the bird into his hand and names it Ash.

events.name: [link:locations,thirven]
events.desc: Alric and Danny meet some reformed bandits and have their expectations challenged again.

events.name: [link:locations,whole]
events.desc: They stay here for a while, it is where [link:high_court,time] inspires Alric. They leave after a confrontation with [link:side_characters,erin_ironforge].

events.name: Meeting the Champion
events.desc: The bros meet the [link:high_court,storms] and do some training

events.name: Infiltrating the sect
events.desc: The bros attempt the sneak into a sect to learn about the heritic's deal
